lines.text: Think about it Kenny. Did we hurt anyone?
Did we steal it from anyone?
Are we giving it back. *Hell no!*
Come on. My shirt has so many holes in it that when I walk down the street, I hum.
[van making clattering noises as it goes down a bumpy road]
It's not my fault that the city doesn't fix the roads.
If Joey Coyle has a $100 bill. You can assure that it's his last $100 bill.
The dumb SOB that took the money, doesn't even know what he's in for?

[holding up a $100 bill]
In terms of empathy, in the sense of putting oneself inside the skin of another person, I admire that man. He was an inventor, he had imagination. He was a bit of a fatso, but he was sexually active. And of all of the Founding Fathers whose faces appear on hard currency, he's the only one cracking a smile. Ben Franklin.
He was smart enough not to be President.
